sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { CoursePlayerResponse, CourseResponse, InstructorResponse, Lecture, VideoAnalytics } from "services/courses"; import { selectPlayerCourse } from "state/player/playerSlice"; import { useFetchPlayerCourseQuery } from "services/courses"; import { useAppSelector } from "store/hooks"; import avatarLogo from "static/images/avatar/profile-avatar.png"; type CourseProps = { course: CourseResponse, instructor: InstructorResponse, analytics: VideoAnalytics[] } export const CourseProgress: React.FC = ({ course, instructor, analytics }) => { const selectedCourse = useAppSelector(selectPlayerCourse) const { data: courseQuery } = useFetchPlayerCourseQuery(course.id) const [lecture, setLecture] = useState(); const [lectures, setLectures] = useState(); const [viewProgress, setViewProgress] = useState() useEffect(() => { if (selectedCourse) { const flatLectures = selectedCourse.sections?.flatMap(sec => sec.lectures) setLectures(flatLectures) const lectureIds = flatLectures?.map(lec => lec.id) const views = analytics?.filter(view => lectureIds?.includes(view.id)) if (views.length) { setViewProgress(views[0]) const lecture = flatLectures?.find(lec => lec.id == views[0].id) setLecture(lecture) } else { if (flatLectures && flatLectures.length) { setViewProgress({ progress: 0, thumbnail: selectedCourse.cover_image, lecture: flatLectures[0]?.id, id: -1 }) } } } }, [selectedCourse]) if (!lectures || !lectures.length) return null; return (
{course.title}

{instructor.first_name ? `${instructor.first_name} ${instructor.last_name}` : instructor.email}

7/23

{}
); };
